hero.subtitle: A complete platform of free online tools. Converters, generators and utilities organized for maximum productivity.
sections.categories.title: Tool Categories
sections.categories.helper: Organize your workflow with our well‑structured categories, each with specialized tools for your needs.
sections.featured.title: Popular Tools
sections.reasons.title: Why Choose SuperTool?
sections.reasons.description: Developed with focus on user experience and maximum productivity
features.cleanInterface.title: Clean Interface
features.cleanInterface.description: Intuitive and responsive design that works perfectly on any device.
features.noSignup.title: No Registration
features.noSignup.description: Use all tools instantly, without the need to create an account or log in.
features.totalSecurity.title: Total Security
features.totalSecurity.description: Local processing when possible, ensuring privacy and security of your data.
categoryDescriptions.converters: Transform files and data between different formats with ease and precision.
categoryDescriptions.generators: Create ready-to-use content using rules and patterns to speed up your work.
categoryDescriptions.web-tools: Essential utilities for developers and digital professionals for everyday tasks.
categoryDescriptions.email-utils: Specialized tools for email development, testing and analysis.
categoryDescriptions.documentation: Tools to generate and manage code and project documentation.

tools.qrCodeGenerator.description: Create customized QR codes for URLs, text and more.
tools.qrCodeGenerator.noDataSent: No data is sent to the server.
tools.passwordGenerator.title: Password Generator
tools.passwordGenerator.description: Generate secure passwords with customizable length and character sets.
tools.urlEncoder.title: URL Encoder/Decoder
tools.urlEncoder.description: Encode and decode URLs for safe transmission over the internet.
tools.jwtAnalyzer.title: JWT Token Analyzer
tools.jwtAnalyzer.description: Decode and inspect JWT tokens for debugging and validation.

meta.emailAnalyzer.description: Analyze email HTML to detect potential spam, deliverability and compatibility issues.

tools.hashGenerator.description: Generate MD5, SHA-1, SHA-256 and other hash values from text.
tools.emailAnalyzer.title: Email Analyzer
tools.emailAnalyzer.description: Analyze email HTML to detect spam, bounce and compatibility issues.
tools.emailAnalyzer.noTypeRules: No specific mandatory rules for this type.
tools.emailAnalyzer.noTypeRulesHelper: For transactional emails, focus on the general rules above.
tools.emailAnalyzer.tooManyExclamationsH: Reduce exclamation points to a maximum of {max} per email.
tools.emailAnalyzer.imagesAltHelp: Add descriptive alt attributes to all images.
tools.emailAnalyzer.unsubscribeMissingHe: Include a clear unsubscribe link in the email footer.
tools.emailAnalyzer.ruleExclamations: Rule: max {max} '!' per email. Current count: {count}.
tools.emailAnalyzer.exclamationsValidati: Checks excessive use of exclamation points.
tools.emailAnalyzer.goodExclamations: Your purchase is confirmed! Thank you.
tools.emailAnalyzer.badExclamations: Your purchase is confirmed!!! Thank you very much!!!
tools.emailAnalyzer.altsValidation: Checks that all images have an alt attribute.
tools.emailAnalyzer.unsubscribeValidatio: Checks for a clear unsubscribe link in the footer.
tools.emailAnalyzer.ruleAlts: Rule: every must have a non-empty alt attribute. Images without alt: {count}.
tools.emailAnalyzer.ruleUnsubscribe: Rule: an unsubscribe link must exist. Keywords: {keywords}. Found: {found}.
